actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on February 27, 2023.

Pursuant to section 4(b) of H. Res. 5, 118th Congress, and the order of the House of Jan. 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following member of the House to the House Democracy Partnership: Mr. Buchanan.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Andy Harris to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
